B.-90-'08                          Sanitarium, California 
                                           March 14, 1908 

Elder J. A. Burden and Others 
   Bearing Responsibilities at Loma Linda 

Dear Brethren: 


     I feel a deep interest that careful study shall be given to the needs of our institutions at Loma Linda, and that the right moves may be made. In the carrying forward of the work at this place, men of talent and of decided spirituality are needed.
